entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:22 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 41 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 41 this morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
